dk_enable(OpenThreads)
dk_enable(osg)
dk_enable(osgUtil)
dk_enable(osgDB)
dk_enable(osgFX)
dk_enable(osgGA)
dk_enable(osgParticle)
dk_enable(osgShadow)
dk_enable(osgTerrain)
dk_enable(osgText)
dk_enable(osgSim)
dk_enable(osgViewer)
dk_enable(osgVolume)
dk_enable(osgWidget)
dk_enable(osgUI)
dk_enable(osgManipulator)
dk_enable(osgAnimation)
dk_enable(osgPresentation)

	# osgPlugins
	dk_enable(osgdb_3dc)
	dk_enable(osgdb_3ds)
	dk_enable(osgdb_ac)
	if(NOT WIN AND NOT MAC AND NOT LINUX)
		#dk_enable(osgdb_avfoundation)
	endif()
	dk_enable(osgdb_bmp)
	dk_enable(osgdb_bsp)
	dk_enable(osgdb_bvh)
	dk_enable(osgdb_cfg)
	if(CURL)
		dk_enable(osgdb_curl)
	endif()
	if(NOT WIN AND NOT MAC AND NOT LINUX)
		#dk_enable(osgdb_dae)
	endif()
	dk_enable(osgdb_dds)
	if(NOT WIN AND NOT MAC AND NOT LINUX)
		#dk_enable(osgdb_dicom)
	endif()
	if(NOT WIN AND NOT MAC AND NOT LINUX)
		#dk_enable(osgdb_directshow)
	endif()
	dk_enable(osgdb_dot)
	dk_enable(osgdb_dxf)
	if(NOT WIN AND NOT MAC AND NOT LINUX)
		#dk_enable(osgdb_exr)
	endif()
	if(NOT WIN AND NOT MAC AND NOT LINUX)
		#dk_enable(osgdb_fbx)
	endif()
	if(FFMPEG)
		dk_enable(osgdb_ffmpeg)
	endif()
	if(FREETYPE)
		dk_enable(osgdb_freetype)
	endif()
	if(GDAL)
		dk_enable(osgdb_gdal)
	endif()
	if(GIFLIB AND NOT MAC AND NOT LINUX AND NOT RASPBERRY)
		dk_enable(osgdb_gif)	#FIXME: not building
	endif()
	dk_enable(osgdb_gles)
	dk_enable(osgdb_glsl)
	if(NOT WIN AND NOT MAC AND NOT LINUX)
		#dk_enable(osgdb_gstreamer)
	endif()
	if(NOT WIN AND NOT MAC AND NOT LINUX)
		#dk_enable(osgdb_gta)
	endif()
	dk_enable(osgdb_gz)
	dk_enable(osgdb_hdr)
	if(APPLE)
		dk_enable(osgdb_imageio)
	endif()
	dk_enable(osgdb_inventor)
	dk_enable(osgdb_ive)
	if(NOT WIN AND NOT MAC AND NOT LINUX)
		#dk_enable(osgdb_jp2)
	endif()
	if(LIBJPEG-TURBO)
		dk_enable(osgdb_jpeg)
	endif()
	dk_enable(osgdb_ktx)
	if(NOT WIN AND NOT MAC AND NOT LINUX)

	endif()

	endif()

	endif()
	
	# osgdb_deprecated
